Powers.String: local Devices, Device, Object, Power, General = ... if Devices then local Own, Other = Object.Translation, Devices[1].Objects[1].Translation if General.Library.VectorLength(General.Library.PointAToB(Own, Other)) > 50 then return true else return false end end

local Devices, Device, Object, Power = ... if Power.Device and Power.Device.Name == 'Asteroid' then Object.Powers[2].Active = true Power.Device.Objects[1].Powers[2].Active = true Power.Active = false Device.Objects[1].Powers[13].Score = Device.Objects[1].Powers[13].Score + 1 end
